item.title: Tron Inc. (TRON) is up by 14.58%, now trading at $11.
item.description: On July 28th, based on the data from rockflow, the US-listed company Tron Inc. (TRON) of Justin Sun witnessed a 14.58% increase in its stock price. It is now trading at $11, and after the US stock market opened, it reached as high as $11.94.BlockBeats previously reported that Tron Inc. submitted a mixed-shelf offering application to the SEC, with a fundraising amount of up to $1 billion (Reuters).

item.title: BNB Chain Ecosystem Tokens See Across-the-Board Increase, CAT Surges 45.9% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 28th, based on market data, the tokens in the BNB Chain ecosystem witnessed a general increase. They include:- CAT with a 24-hour change of +45.9% and currently priced at $0.0000122.- BANANAS31 with a 24-hour change of +18% and currently priced at $0.00744.- LISTA with a 24-hour change of +13.57% and currently priced at $0.3267.- MUBARAK with a 24-hour change of +13% and currently priced at $0.04799.- TST with a 24-hour change of +11.85% and currently priced at $0.04669.- CAKE with a 24-hour change of +9.33% and currently priced at $3.058.

item.title: New "BNB Version Micro Strategy" US Stock VAPE Soars 523.58% at Opening, Now Trading at $55.34
item.description: On July 28th, based on rockflow data, the new "BNB Version Micro Strategy" US stock VAPE opened with a growth of 523.58%, and it is currently priced at $55.34, with a reported market capitalization of $52.7564 million.BlockBeats previously reported that CEA Industries and 10X Capital, with the support of YZi Labs, announced a $500 million private placement to establish the world's largest publicly traded BNB financial corporation.

item.title: US Stock and Cryptocurrency Stocks Generally Open Higher, BTCS Up 8.13%
item.description: On July 28th, according to Rockflow data, when the US stock market opened, the S&P 500 Index increased by 0.12% and the Nasdaq rose by 0.36%. Cryptocurrency stocks generally opened with a higher opening, including: Galaxy Digital (GLXY) rose by 1.06%; Circle (CRCL) decreased by 0.6%; Coinbase (COIN) rose by 0.41%; MicroStrategy (MSTR) rose by 1.65%; MARA Holdings (MARA) rose by 0.58%; BTCS (BTCS) rose by 8.13%; Bit Digital (BTBT) rose by 2.22%; SharpLink Gaming (SBET) rose by 0.77%; Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) rose by 1.79%.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Launches Treehouse (TREE), to Be Listed for Spot Trading on July 29th
item.description: On July 28th, according to official information, the Binance HODLer Airdrop is set to launch its 29th project, Treehouse (TREE).During the time period from 00:00 (UTC) on July 10, 2025, to 23:59 (UTC) on July 13, 2025, users who subscribed to BNB in Simple Yield (Flexible Yield and/or Locked Yield) and/or On-Chain Yield products will be eligible for the airdrop. The details of the HODLer airdrop are expected to be announced within 24 hours, and the new token will be distributed to users' spot accounts at least 1 hour before trading begins.In addition, Binance will list TREE on July 29, 2025, at 14:00 (UTC) and open trading for USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY pairs. TREE will receive a Seed Label. Users can start depositing TREE on July 28, 2025, at 16:00 (UTC).

item.title: Trump: I believe the Fed must cut rates this week
item.description: July 28th: When asked whether the Federal Reserve should cut interest rates this week, U.S. President Trump expressed his belief that it is necessary to do so. (Xinhua News Agency)

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Volcon has announced an additional purchase of 316.9 bitcoins, bringing their total holdings to over 3,500 bitcoins.
item.description: On July 28th, according to official information, the U.S. listed company Volcon Inc. (VLCN) has increased its holdings by 316.8 bitcoins since its previous disclosure on July 25th, which amounts to $37.3 million. As of the date of the announcement, the company's total bitcoin holdings have reached 3,500.18 bitcoins, with a total investment of approximately $412 million and an average acquisition cost of $117,683 per bitcoin.

item.title: Or Possibly Pumped by 108K HYPE Messages, Stock HYPD Surges 6.75% in Pre-market
item.description: On July 28th, based on Rockflow data, the pre-market trading of the US stock HYPD may be affected by the announcement of holding an additional 108,594 HYPE tokens. The stock shows a 6.75% increase and is currently trading at $8.22.BlockBeats previously reported that Hyperion DeFi (Nasdaq stock code: HYPD) announced the acquisition of an additional 108,594 HYPE tokens, bringing its total HYPE holdings to 1,535,772 tokens, with an average purchase cost of $36.14 per token.

item.title: Credit Protocol Grove Expands to Avalanche Network, Plans to Invest $250 Million in Tokenized Credit Products
item.description: On July 28th, as per Coindesk, the credit protocol Grove within the Sky ecosystem (formerly of the MakerDAO ecosystem) announced on Monday that it is set to expand to the Avalanche blockchain network and intends to allocate up to $250 million in funding to tokenized credit products.According to the announcement, Grove will make an investment in the Anemoy AAA-rated CLO fund (JAAA) issued by Janus Henderson via the blockchain tokenization platform Centrifuge. Janus Henderson, a globally prominent asset management company with $373.0 billion in assets under management, has become one of the largest-scale endeavors by traditional financial institutions to enter the Avalanche Real World Asset (RWA) ecosystem. Centrifuge will also launch the Janus Henderson Anemoy Treasury fund backed by US Treasury bonds (JTRSY).It is reported that the Grove team comprises former members from Deloitte, Citi, and BlockTower who previously assisted MakerDAO in expanding the tokenized national debt market

item.title: TRON, Inc. Submits Mixed Shelf Offering Application to SEC, with Fundraising Scale of Up to $1 Billion
item.description: On July 28th, according to Reuters, TRON. Inc submitted a hybrid shelf offering to the SEC with a fundraising ceiling of up to $1 billion.
